name: Polymer Weather App
tagline: Simple Weather App developed with Polymer
body:
# Polymer Weather App
Simple Weather App developed with Polymer.

# Features v1.0.1
- Search weather by city.
- Current weather.
- Show current weather for next 24 hours (3 hours period).
- Show weather for next 9 days.

# Screenshot
![Webapp](http://s23.postimg.org/omqne1d7f/first.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
